[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------		

[i][b]Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft astronauts Jim Lovell (Hanks), Fred Haise (Paxton) and Jack Swigert (Bacon) fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly (Sinise), flight director Gene Kranz (Harris) and a heroic ground crew race against time, and the odds, to bring them home.

It's a breathtaking adventure that tells a story of courage, faith, and ingenuity that is all the more remarkable as it's based on true events!
[/b][/i]
